data.description:
Open World Farming Sandbox
Work your overgrown forest into a thriving farm! Clear the forests, grow crops, keep animals, craft fences and more! Turn a wild landscape into your dream farmstead.

Feed the Citadel
Complete Quests for the citizens of the Citadel to earn their respect.

Grow a Bountiful Harvest
Select from 21 plants, vegetables and fruit to grow, from 7 different layers - trees, fruit trees, bushes, herbaceous, ground covers, roots, vegetables and vines.

Design Your Garden Layout
Do you prefer your garden in tidy rows, many small gardens, or one large plot? Layout your garden in your own custom design.

Swing Your Tools into Action
Level up your tools with every use - Use your shovel, axe, pick axe, fishing rod and bucket

Upgrade and Improve
Upgrade your farm by crafting or purchasing fences and much more!

Visit The Market
Trade your fruit and vegetables at the local market to earn gold coins.

Snap, Smooth and Teleport
Use your favourite locomotion style

changelog.change_log: Fixed Fishing Rod and Pickaxe!

Massive Localization Update!!!
Now Supporting:
-Chinese Traditional
-Chinese Simplified
-French
-German
-Italian
-Japanese
-Korean
-Portuguese
-Russian
-Spanish

Fixed Startup
Fixed Performance Bottlenecks
Start Scene Added

Animal Updates
Red and blue fish are now salmon!
Rabbits updated to match the rest of the animals!
Start Scene Added

Potion and Building Fix Update

Potions will now function as one would expect, just grab the potion, pour it onto your crops and it will disappear when empty.

Potion crafting has also been fixed, make potions from your collected ingredients!

Building has been optimised with the raised beds removed and the shelf, cart and chicken coop improved!

Barn Update!
Fill your barn with rabbits, chickens, goats and cows!
Feed them their favourite foods and watch them grow.
Once they're big enough, sell them at the animal dealer to earn a profit!

Multi Grab Update!

Grab all items in an inventory slot by holding the trigger when you grab an item out of your inventory

Makes selling so much easier!
Fixed Planting Issues
Fixed Tutorial Quest Logging
Cosy House Update!
Fix Data Manager
Fishing Rod Fixed

Fixed Tools
Fishing Rod Fixed
Bucket Fixed

Massive Overhaul of the Start of Forest Farm
Start Tutorial Added
Gibberish for NPC's added
Unlocking tools added

Major Visual Update for trees
Major Simplicity Update for planting
Soil removed as a requirement for planting
Trees now cut down more simply
Major Performance Update - 72 FPS on Quest 2!!!

Fixed Inventory Grabbing Issues
Fixed Shovel Plot Placement

Added to Tutorial - giving players a better introduction
Fixed Gold and Respect Issues
